title: Need help to id this font
content:
Hi,

I need help to identify this font.

Regards

Peter

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824134325/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_115.jpg) | 20.63 KB |
author: pebe99

comments.content: To me, it's either a freebie "based on" [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824134325/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/eurostile) Extended/ [Microgramma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824134325/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/microgramma) or a customized Eurostile/Microgramma.
